attributes.action: Compensate students for rents on property they cannot access by law.
attributes.additional_details:
University students signed contracts to attain the right of residency within their student accommodation without prior knowledge of government plans for lockdown. Thus they were not aware of the autonomous decision which has caused damage to their investment. 

This right of residency has been damaged severely by government policy on travel to and from university - causing financial loss. 

Therefore, Government should provide compensation for losses (rent for the period of lockdown).
attributes.background: The Government should setup a scheme and process where students can claim financial damages and compensation for government lockdown policy which is currently preventing students access to their accommodation at university.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560735
